items.sentence: Tom stood in the doorway for a moment before entering the room.
I loved my ex-wife, but I just couldn\'t live with her anymore.
It took me more than three hours to translate this into French.
Tom always says hi to me when we pass each other on the street.
Tom always wanted to go to Boston, but he never had the chance.
I think I might buy that house on Park Street that\'s for sale.
Are you aware of how much time Tom has been spending with Mary?
Are you sure you really want to go swimming on a day like this?
Australia is one of the countries I want to visit before I die.
Both Tom and Mary were quite good-looking when they were young.
